@@ -874,33 +874,6 @@ bounds instead of overflowing.
 
 Basic usage:
 
-```

-                    Some(x) => x,
-                    None if rhs >= 0 => Self::max_value(),
-                    None => Self::min_value(),
-                }
-            }
-
